ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 163
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, Efrieum will share, he is a good guy :), but I doubt he will be able to make pets. I kind of remember someone here earlier that could tell that Verrant
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, Efrieum will share, he is a good guy :), but I
doubt he will be able to make pets. I kind of remember
someone here earlier that could tell that Verrant
removed tinkered pets from the game after beta, due to
unbalancing? And that tinkered pets never worked in
beta anyway? Of course, thats second hand information,
and not all that relieable, so I wish and hope

Captain Piip Ignatz
Pirates of Dark Tide
Innoruuk
Gnome rogue 34 yesterday!



> Message: 5
> Date: Wed, 1 Dec 1999 00:06:19 -0800 (PST)
> From: Brad Balatgek <gazamel@...>
> Subject: Re: tinkering recipes
>
> Woohoo!! I hope he shares, that will be a BIG boon
> for all the tinkerers out there!
>
> Gazamel
> Solusek Ro
> 50th Gnome Warrior
> Master Tinker
>
> --- Monica Bradlee <mbradlee@...> wrote:
> > I think I found out the link between 102 and 120,
> > low level pets. here is
> > what I know so far: Small power module, Gnomish
> > Gear, blackbox (not sure if
> > piece or regular) and 2 other components. gonna
> > pester the guy who knows
> > untill he tells me will get back to you all soon
> >
> > Efrieum
> > 35 warrior
> > damned happy now, still want cap removed
> >
